body_content.explanation: (an example of) uncontrolled and excited behaviour or emotion that is sometimes violent:
examples: In a frenzy of rage she hit him.
the media frenzy over the celebrity wedding
The audience worked themselves into a frenzy as they waited for her to come on stage.
He had whipped himself into a frenzy and was now not able to calm himself.
There was a frenzy of activity in the financial markets yesterday.
In a moment of jealous frenzy, she cut the sleeves off all his shirts.
